name: aedg_k12_electric_equipment

arguments.name: material_cost_ip
arguments.display_name: Material and Installation Costs for Electric Equipment per Floor Area

modeler_description_xml: Equipment in un-recognized spaces will be left alone. This measure will attempt to retain schedules from the initial model. If the initial model contained multiple electric equipment objects associated with multiple schedules, then one of those schedules will be picked for the new electric equipment.
description_xml: This measure removes all existing electric equipment from spaces recognized as primary or secondary school space types. New electric equipment will be added based on the 50% K12 AEDG recommendations. Kitchen equipment wont' be altered by this measure. There is a stand alone AEDG measure specifically for the kitchen.
